name: Protolife
description: Protolife is an unique tower-based strategy game which gives you a direct control over the builder robot in a struggle against the hungry proto-life organism.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: 2.7 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 support, 256 MB VRAM Storage: 500 MB available space Additional Notes: Minimum resolution: 1280 x 720
